name: The Tale of Stoop
description:
Hey!  This was my first time making a Game in Unity. The Tale of Stoop is sort of a passion project I slowly developed. It utilizes some free-to-use unity assets but most of the work was done by me with my own hands. The OST was composed entirely by myself and will be published in my Youtube Channel in the future. I hope you enjoy it.

Movement is heavily inspired by CS:GO, some other influences were StickFight: The Game, Karlson by Dani, World of Warcraft and Portal 2.
